22.description: This is the room of jewels.

jeweldispenser.examineDescription: Use the jewel dispenser to get a jewel.

23.description: This is a room of jewels.

ajeweldispenser.examineDescription: Use the jewel dispenser to get a jewel.

24.shortName: The Start of The Zombie Graveyard
24.description: You are at the start of the zombie graveyard you can see a gate to the North that is rusted shut and will not open, ever. The graveyard is misty but you can see a path heading South

dirtyrock.description: A dirty rock on the ground
dirtyrock.examineDescription: The rock is actually an old broken slab, on the reverse is some writing and it reads: You can leave the maze if you say brains backwards.

rustygate.examineDescription: The Gate will not move, and is heavily padlocked, through the gate you can see dusty, dark cobwebbed corridor which has not been walked through in years. At the end of that you can see a faint light and it looks like corridor of the dungeon you just left. You can't go through the gate.

25.description: You are in a tomb beside a drum

26.description: You are waist deep in mist in a Zombie Graveyard and can make out a tomb

tomb.examineDescription: The tomb of the Money God. A sign above the tomb proclaims 'say moneygod' and treasure will fall, say it too often and once will be all.

27.description: You are knee deep in mist in a Zombie Graveyard and can make out a set of gravestones

gravestones.examineDescription: The gravestones are old, very old, ancient, written on them is a twisted language that you can't read. Which is lucky, because you would be scared if you understood what it said

28.description: You are neck deep in mist in a Zombie Graveyard and can make out the top of some tombstones

tombstones.examineDescription: The tombstones are old, very old, ancient, written on them is a twisted language that you can't read. And spray painted over the top of that is writing that says 'You Say Voodoo, I say Drum'

29.description: The mist is over your head and you can just see your feet, you are standing on a pile of bones

pileofbones.examineDescription: The bones have teeth marks all over them, they look like human teeth marks. Hey, I don't think this is a nice place.

30.description: The mist has cleared and you can see a shallow open grave with a dead body and an axe in its head

axeindeadbody.description: An Axe In The Dead Body
axeindeadbody.examineDescription: The axe has a wooden handle, and carved into the handle are the words 'Ash woz here' and say 'groovy'.

deadbody.examineDescription: The dead body is dessicated but has splendid teeth. I think the axe is there for a reason.

31.description: The southern most room of star rooms

10.description: This is the middle of the eastern corridor in the East

32.description: The most central room of star rooms

11.description: This is the western end of the eastern corridor in the East

zombiemazesign.description: A sign on the wall covered in blood
zombiemazesign.examineDescription: Say brains to enter the Zombie Graveyard maze where much treasure lies

33.description: The most northern room of star rooms

starsign.examineDescription: The sign says to use the sign and you might get lucky

12.description: This is the middle of the room in the north of the North room

clothdispenser.examineDescription: Use the dispenser to get a cloth.

34.description: The most western room of star rooms

13.description: This is the west of the middle of the room in the north

torchdispenser.examineDescription: Use the dispenser to get a torch.

35.description: The most eastern room of star rooms

14.description: This is the east of the middle of the room in the north

clockhands.examineDescription: The hands look like they have been moved and well used.

tallgrandfatherclock.examineDescription: The clock hands have fingerprints on them.

36.description: In each of the REST rooms will be signs telling you what api requests to perform.

restroomsexplained.description: Sign That Explains What You Have To Do in the REST Rooms
restroomsexplained.examineDescription: In the REST Rooms you will needto use the api/player/yourname. You can use the API at the same time as the GUI either with Basic Auth, session cookie, or the authentication header from /info or when you registered or logged via the API

15.description: This is a secret room, ssh, don't tell anyone

postexplain.description: Sign That Explains What You Have To Do

postheaderexplain.description: Sign That Explains What You Have To Do For More Points
postheaderexplain.examineDescription: POST to api/player/user "verb" : "examine", "nounphrase" : "postheader"} with custom header X-REST-MUD-POST-EXAMINE for points

16.description: This is the secret clock room. There are no clocks here.

getheaderexplain.description: Sign That Explains What You Have To Do For Points
getheaderexplain.examineDescription: GET api/player/user/examine/getheader with custom header X-REST-MUD-GET-EXAMINE for points

17.description: This is the secret room north of 12 that everyone forgets about.

39.description: The Rest Rooms small DELETE Room

fightsmalltrollsign.description: How to fight the small troll

smalltroll.examineDescription: The Troll glares at you as though you have seen something you should not have.

18.description: This is the Entrance to Puzzle Land.

19.description: The corridor of puzzles where each room offers new challenges, should you choose to chase a high score through your cleverness

0.description: This is the room of Junk

1.description: This is the room in the center

2.description: This is the room in the north

sign_1.examineDescription: Shh, GO Now, I think I see a secret way in 'The East Room'. Shhh.

3.description: This is the room in the east

puzzlelandsign.description: A sign on the wall shaped like a question mark
puzzlelandsign.examineDescription: To enter puzzle land you have to be able to say puzzle.

4.description: This is the room in the South, there is a broken teleporter to the south

5.description: This is the room in the West

rustedshutdoor.description: A rusted shut iron door to the south
rustedshutdoor.examineDescription: A heavy Iron door that has not been opened in a long time. It is rusted shut. And heavily barred. There is also a padlock. And the root is covered in chains. A sign on the door says 'do not enter under any circumstances, the graveyard is dangerous, the treasures here are not worth it, unless you are a Voodoo Master, in which case the Money God will rain treasure down upon you'. Looking through the bars on the door you can see a corridor that has not been used in a long time and beyond that, what looks like a rusty gate leading to a graveyard. You faintly hear something say 'brains'.

6.description: This is the eastern end of the western corridor in the West that continues West and East

sign_3.description: A helpful sign on the wall
sign_3.examineDescription: West might be best. Even if it gets dark and you want to rest, it might be a test, so go east, or west.

loosestone.description: A loose stone on the floor
loosestone.examineDescription: Someone has carved something on the stone, it looks like it says 'lickforten'

forgettablesign.description: A grotty forgettable sign on the wall
forgettablesign.examineDescription: I think there is a room north of 12, but you will forget this information in 6

7.description: This is the middle of the western corridor in the West

starshapedbutton.examineDescription: Red buttons are usually dangerous, I would not use that if I were you

8.description: This is the western end of the western corridor in the West, it continues E, and a teleporter is to the West

sign_2.description: A direction sign on the wall
sign_2.examineDescription: You can go East as far as you can see, even if you cannot see. Do you see?

voodoodrum.examineDescription: This is a ceremonial voodoo drum used by expert voodoo practitioners to control zombies. It can only be used by Houngans or Mambos of great power. There is a sticker on the side that says 'use voodoodrum. scare zombies'.

9.description: This is the eastern end of the eastern corridor in the East

starshapedsign.examineDescription: The Sign Says: Red star shaped buttons are brilliant, I always use them and so should you

megaclothdispenser.examineDescription: Use the dispenser to get a cloth.

40.description: The Rest Rooms large DELETE Room

largetroll.examineDescription: The Large Troll glares at you. You should not be looking at him.

fightlargetrollsign.description: How to fight the large troll
fightlargetrollsign.examineDescription: DELETE api/player/user/fight/largetroll with custom header X-SUPER-FIGHTING-SKILLS-VERY-HARD for points

20.description: This is a room with a hammer.

hammer.description: A hammer chained to the floor
hammer.examineDescription: Someone has chained a heavy hammer to the floor, I could probably use that to smash something, if I had something to smash.

21.description: This is a room with whole bunch of vases (and treasure).

vasepuzzlesign.description: A Sign On The Wall Of the Vase Puzzle Room
vasepuzzlesign.examineDescription: Every vase has a prize. But only one per player.

commands.parameters: usercanenterpuzzleland:true
you say 'puzzle' and a shimmery door opens to the south allowing you entry to puzzle land.
you try to say 'puzzle' but you can't say the phrase, it is almost as if you have said it before and are tired of repeating yourself.
zombieattack:0
zombieattackhappening:true
you say 'brains' and you hear a booming laugh. then you hear a loud drumming, everything goes dark and you are standing in a cold dark graveyard.
you say 'brains backwards' and you hear a booming laugh. fool. say 'brains' in reverse, not literally 'brains backwards'.
zombieattackhappening
zombieattack

you say 'brains' backwards and you hear drums grow louder, the mist grows thicker and you see the hands of zombies reaching towards you, a zombie face snaps its jaws shut horribly close to your nose, darkness envelops you. and you are no longer in the graveyard. you check your nose. it is as noselike as it was before you entered the graveyard. but where are you?
you call upon the money god, and anger the money god, for it is too soon to call upon the money god. wait
moneygod:0
prayedtomoneygod:true
wow, you have mighty vodou powers. you call upon the money god and treasure falls in the graveyard
you called upon the loa
true
you say 'voodoo', and you hear drums drumming loudly as though drummers are playing loudly on drums. you look around and see you are in a tomb, with a drum, and no drummers
you say 'groovy', and you hear someone say 'shut those drums up, they are giving me a headache. you look around and see you are in a tomb, with a drum, and no-one with a headache
useriscarryingaavase
userhaspickedupavase

you drop the vase (i assume you are trying to smash it to get the treasure). but the vase vanishes before it hits the floor. so now you have no vase, no smashed vase, and no treasure from the smashed vase. there must be another way to smash the vase and get the treasure.
you are not carrying a vase to drop.
all the vases look the same, and glinting at the bottom of each is some sort of treasure.
you are sure that glinting at the bottom of your vase is the most valuable treasure.
you look at the strange small round thing. it appears to have 'tick' written on it.

you look at the strange small round thing. it appears to have 'tick' written on one side of it, and 'bomb' written on the other. it is making very loud 'tick' and 'tock' noises. do you think it is an alarm clock? i wonder if it will go off soon?
remembertheforgettablesign:6
you remember something about a room north of 12.
postsignexamined:true
that was easy, your score increased
postsignexaminedheader:true
that was easy, your score increased
getsignexaminedheader:true
that was easy, your score increased
userhaspickedupabomb:false
you feel as though your score has increased.

you look at the strange small round thing, realise it is a bomb. and drawing on your years of experience with defusing bombs you throw it away in the hope that you will never see it again. you can't see it now, and you will probably never see it again.
userlickedstone:true
you lick the stone - bleurgh, that tasted funny, i wonder if everyone licks it. yuck. cooties. but you did gain 10 points on your score.
nope, i licked that once, i'm never doing it again. you must have forgotten how bad it tasted. yucky. and you lost 5 points from your score for trying to cheat the system.
smalltrolldefeated:true
you poke the small troll in the nose and it squeals and runs away. you win the fight.
largetrolldefeated:true
you punch the large troll in the stomache and it looks at you, then slowly fades away. you win the fight. you super fighter all win fight
userhaspickedupavase:true
useriscarryingaavase:true
you look around and try to pick the best vase, but they all look the same, so you pick the first one that you find.
you already picked one up, the sign said only one per player - boo to you for trying to cheat. you lost some points you cheater.
the treasures are in the vases, you can't just take a treasure, you really need to take a vase first.

you grab the treasure at the bottom of the vase, but you can't get your hand out of the vase while holding the treasure. you can take your hand out if you leave the treasure behind, but nah, that's not going to happen.
the treasures are in the vases, you can't just take a treasure, you should already know that you need to take a vase first. haven't you been taking notes?
userhaspickedupabomb:true
userpickedupbombcountdown:10

you bend over and pick up the small round thing, you hear it go tock, and then tick, and then tick. and it keeps going 'tick' as though it is counting down to something. i wonder what it is. oh, by the way. the word 'bomb' is written on the other side.
you could use the hammer, but you have nothing to smash. so you decide not to do that - why waste your energy?
useriscarryingaavase

you use the hammer to smash the vase and your greedy eyes spy the treasure. you watch the treasure roll off to the side of the room and down a hole. what? such a disappointment. then you hear laughter and a voice says 'well done adventurer, you have scored some points'.
you are not carrying a vase, were you trying to score points again? oh oh. points removed for trying to cheat. what are you? a tester?
secretclockpanel
secretclockpanel
you move the clock hands. you hear a squeal of wood and metal as something opens.
i can't use the clock, have you examined it carefully?
useddrum:true
wow, you have mighty vodou powers. you can see zombies shuffling off into the darkness saying 'see ya, back soon'
zombieattack:0
you called upon the loa
you wait until a zombie has its teeth around your throat before you use your voudun powers. zombies shuffle off sighing 'ok dokey eat ya later'
zombieattack:0
you called upon the loa once more, but you cut it too close that time, you almost gave me a heart attack
you use your voudun powers. zombies shuffle off sighing 'ok dokey eat ya later'
zombieattack:0
you called upon the loa once more, but you cut it a but close that time
you use your voudun powers. zombies shuffle off sighing 'ok dokey eat ya later'
zombieattack:0
you called upon the loa once more
true
you press the button and a star shaped portal to the north appears, you walk through it because you can't help it.
starsigncounter:-3
true
you hear a kachink noise in the distance
starsigncounter:true
starsigncounterflag:true
starsigncounter:0
true
you hear a loud kachink noise in the distance
starsigncounter:1
true
you hear a dull thud
smalltroll:a small ugly troll
largetroll:a large very ugly troll
you enter puzzle land.
you walk west and realise you just stepped into a transporter. <zap> <pfizz> <twazzap>.

you step into the broken transporter. <zap> <pfizz> 'ouch', that hurt you, and for no benefit. you are in the same room. the transporter is broken. i think there is another transporter around here somewhere
seensecretroomnorthof12:true
you scored some points.
you found the secret room that everyone forgets about
seensecretroomnorthof12:true
you found the secret room again, but you can only score the points once.
you found the secret room that everyone forgets about
you can see a small round thing on the floor
the small round thing with the words 'tick' and 'bomb' is ticking loudly
userpickedupbombcountdown:-1
userhaspickedupabomb:false
userpickedupbombcountdown
the small round thing with the words 'tick' and 'bomb' vanishes in a puff of smoke - lucky you didn't panic and try and defuse the bomb, or you might have blown yourself up
you feel as through your score has increased as a result.
you remember something about a secret room north of 12. and you think you might forget soon.
remembertheforgettablesign:-1
you forgot to remember something about a secret room north of 12.
remembertheforgettablesign
moneygod:1
the mighty money god will hear your prayers again.
prayedtomoneygod
moneygod
zombieattack:1
you heard moaning from the graveyard.
you heard an ominous silence. the graveyard is still. you feel something become aware of your presence.
you heard something moan. it sounded like it said 'brains'.
you heard something groan. it sounded like it said 'mmm, can smell tasty brains'.
you heard something wheeze. it sounded like it said 'oh, there, me can see tasty brain box'.
you heard something burble. it sounded like it said 'oh, there, me can see tasty brain box'.
you heard something shout loudly. it sounded like it said 'me open brain box now'.
zombieattackhappening:false

you were attacked by a zombie and now you are dead. fooled you. actually you were teleported to a new location and lost some score. but it was really horrible what the zombie did to you before we rebuilt you from the ground up. why didn't you scare the zombies away?

welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Treasure Hunt Adventure Game
